resources.string: Get Ready To Travel Around Space!
You are now about to pass through a meteorite zone, please dodge in time to avoid hitting it!!!
Note the left number(blue) that appear on the screen and compare to the right number(orange) then choosing the correct symbol.
After many explorations, you have collected a large number of rare resources from the planet!
Now is to arrange them all! Press and drag the numbers on the screen and follow the instructions on the control panel below!
Unfortunately, the ship went down when you decided to return, so you try to repair it by yourself.
Pay attention to the target numbers provided on top, and select the numbers below to make up the target number!
